title: Tour Daily Podcast Finale: From Paris to Toyko!
content:
Tour Daily Podcast Finale: From Paris to Toyko!

Dane and James join the podcast once more for a quick recap of the Tour de France and a preview of the men’s and women’s Olympic road races. For a deeper discussion of the women’s race check out the Freewheeling Podcast.

     SUBSCRIBE TO THE ‘CYCLINGTIPS PODCAST‘
Never miss an episode. Subscribe to our CyclingTips Podcast on iTunes, Spotify,  Google or wherever you get your podcasts.

author: Abby Mickey
